Posts.Content: So true, thank you so much x
Posts.Title: What's the best way to tell my mum?

Posts.Content: I only found out 2 days ago I have breast cancer and am waiting for my treatment plan until I tell my mum, I'm 36 but my mum suffers with severe depression and drink problems I'm worried this is going to trigger a bad episode... do I go in all smiles and play it down and theories or advice would be very very welcome!
Posts.Title: What's the best way to tell my mum?

Posts.Content: Wow thanks that's exstremely helpful and heartfelt x
